archimate:Goal.name: Classification of Norwegian services, ownerships and the timeline synchronized with DPS Transformation project
archimate:Goal.documentation:
Define the target states and schedules for the identified services against the DPS Transformation activity. To get overall understanding what assets + services needs security improvements in case the migration timeline is not sufficient.
To meet this goal, we must understand what services we have in Norway and what is their migration timeline against DPS Transformation project. It might be, that there is easy wins where service is already obsole or can be migrated away in short timeframe.
However, we might see that majority of the services are required for few years before migration / rampdown can be made. This then leads to a short term plans how to mitigate the lifecycle issue
